description:
Tired of sending national and international SMS at the very high rate of your provider? We have the right solution for you. Send SMS text messages with your VoipBuster account from your Palm device to avoid the high sms charges of your mobile operator. SMS rates are very low.
To use this application, you need to create an account on http://www.voipbuster.com/en/websignup.php .
Features :
-Relies on and uses the same SMS rates as Voipbuster, one of the cheapest IP Telephony providers on the market
-More reliable than Skype
